articles.description: Nobody can claim that England’s 32-15 win over Australia and Ireland’s rousing 29-20 triumph over New Zealand, this weekend, came out of the blue. England has won their last eight Test matches against Australia, and 12 of the last 14, while Ireland, after com…
articles.content:
Nobody can claim that England’s 32-15 win over Australia and Ireland’s rousing 29-20 triumph over New Zealand, this weekend, came out of the blue.
England has won their last eight Test matches again… [+11446 chars]

articles.author: Matteo Aglio
articles.title: MotoGP, Rossi: I was a rider until the very end, it was better than I thought - GPOne.com
articles.description: "I will be able to say for years that I was one of the 10 best riders in the world in my last race. I have only one regret, the title I lost in 2015"
articles.content: And so it was time to face the final curtain, which include hugs, fireworks and 75,000 crazy spectators. A yellow tide for the final tribute to Valentino Rossi, even when the colour of the team gear … [+4724 chars]
